results.title: Thelma and Louise (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Ridley Scott, Mimi Polk and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Fasten your seatbelts as two of Hollywood’s hottest women rev it up and take it on the road! When unhappy housewife Thelma (Geena Davis) and her wisecracking friend Louise (Susan Sarandon) decide to take a break from their lives, they embark on a trip that leads to a tragic incident at a roadside honky tonk. In an instant, their weekend “getaway” becomes just that as they flee across the American southwest with the police one step behind. A classic twist of the usual “buddy-outlaw” movie, where men are most often the unlikely heroes, this film has a charming, refreshing and triumphant outlook. Co-starring Harvey Keitel.

results.title: Theirs is tomorrow
results.creator_credit: Roy A. Driver and Herschells Films
results.brief_description: A survey of the educational facilities provided by the Education Department in the State of Victoria. The film shows typical activities of students attending Primary, Secondary and Technical schools and at the Teachers Training College.

results.title: Theirs is the kingdom
results.brief_description: Two high school boys attempting to solve the problems of poverty in a Mexican border town, cause a near riot because of their insensitivity. Back at school one of the boys realises that the whole venture was no more than an ego trip, and tries to escape his feelings by speeding out to the desert on his bike. The bike upsets and he finds himself in the dust, alone unable to take anymore, he cries out to God. Some days later, Carl at peace, is seen alone heading back to spend a few days living among the people in the border town.

results.title: Their world (TEFC)
results.brief_description: This film explores the significance of play as a preparation for life and is an insight into child beahviour and personality. By confonting a selection of children with a “mini world” each child is invited to build his or her world using a vast assortment of tiny props. Hungarian dialogue with English subtitles.

results.title: Their health is our wealth
results.creator_credit: Malcolm Otton, Eric Thompson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: The film shows the various stages of training for degrees in Veterinary Science at the University of Sydney and the University of Brisbane, including academic training and practical training at the University farm. The film also shows aspects of the various fields of work open to graduates (for example private practice with farm animals or pets, research work for government agencies or commercial firms).

results.title: Their first year
results.creator_credit: Roland Feven, Phillip Sattin and Eothen Films
results.brief_description: Advice for mothers on child care during the first year of life. Observes several mothers and babies and gives guidance on such subjects as bathing, breast and bottle feeding, teething, potting, sickness after meals, the “three month colic”, immunization, and hazards in the home. Raises, without trying to resolve, the problem of the psychological impact of a new arrival on older children.

results.title: Their campus the sea
results.brief_description: At Jervis Bay Royal Australian Navy College young men are trained for a life at sea to defend Australian shores. Aimed at a complete education the course includes science, engineering, mechanics, some humanities, physical education and sport. The trainees are encouraged to participate in extra activities such as debating and drama. After a year at sea they return to specialise in a particular field.

results.title: Their bridge again: restoration of the Tasman Bridge
results.brief_description: On January 5th, 1975, the Tasman Bridge in Hobart, tragically collapsed, sinking a ship and her cargo and dismembering sections of the bridge in seconds. For 2 1/2 years Hobart was without a central road link across the river, whilst reconstruction work was underway. This was a test of skill of the engineers, and the restoration was a great challenge to all concerned. Work on the project is shown through the various stages until final completion.

results.title: Theft of the Mona Lisa
results.creator_credit: Barry Stoner, Suzanne Duroux and Stoner Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Treasures of the world”.
The world’s most famous painting, Leonardo da Vinci’s Mona Lisa disappeared from The Louvre in 1911. It would be another two years before she was safely recovered. This program traces the suspects and conspiracy theories, as well as the environment in which the world’s most famous Renaissance man painted. It covers public reaction to the theft, techniques and innovations used in the painting, motivation behind the theft and the repercussions to the art world and society as a whole once she was found. Narrated by Krisha Fairchild.
